name: Awestruck [DEMO]
description:
~EPILEPSY WARNING~

~ S T O R Y ~

Every few years, a two children are born with the essence of Longinus and Latitude. These children host the energy that keeps the universe in balance. On December 20th, 20X7, a young teen strolls into the woods.  As he ventures through the woods, the truth is learned, and cycle begins anew. 

This is a small demo for a project I would like to eventually complete. If you would like to support me, please let me know any criticism or support in the comments below.
